Configuration.Name: 5mm_PRESSURE_CELL_L1=L2=20m_central_5A_apx10_NO_TILT_STAGE_TEIXEIRA
Configuration.SetupScript: sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 28300') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5') config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -23 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 88.7235 config.beamcenterz = 94.5791 config.drive()
